summary.span: O namespace contém classes que fornecem a configuração de aplicativos e serviços criados com a WIF (Windows Identity Foundation).

span.span: The namespace contains classes that provide configuration for applications and services built using the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).

summary.span: As classes deste namespace representam as configurações no elemento [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md).

span.span: The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element.

summary.span: Classes que configuram a federação usando o protocolo Web Services Federation estão contidas principalmente no namespace .

span.span: Classes that configure federation using the WS-Federation protocol are contained primarily in the namespace.

summary.span: Essas configurações aparecem sob o elemento [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) em um arquivo de configuração.

span.span: These settings appear under the [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) element in a configuration file.
